approach_and_lure.communication_migration: WeChat (no migration mentioned, relationship maintained on WeChat)

scammer_persona.claimed_identity: Famous model with romantic interest and cryptocurrency investment expertise

impersonation_and_psychology.trust_building_period: Extended period (WeChat relationship development before investment introduction)

escalation_pattern.trigger_event: attempted large withdrawal for house purchase

temporal_indicators.scam_duration: Extended period (weeks to months, from WeChat introduction through relationship building to platform shutdown)
key_timeline_events: Relationship development with famous model persona
Initial deposits and successful small withdrawals
Increased deposits based on fake profits

reconnaissance.description: Scammer likely identified victim through WeChat platform searches or social media reconnaissance
Gathered victim's financial capacity and personal information during relationship building
reconnaissance.evidence: Victim's ability to invest $550,000 and desire to purchase house

resource_development.description: Created fake trading platform Unktlife.com to simulate legitimate cryptocurrency trading
Created fake WeChat profile impersonating famous model
resource_development.evidence: Scammer represented himself as famous model on WeChat

resource_development.description: Potentially obtained SSL certificates for Unktlife.com to appear legitimate
resource_development.evidence: Website operational with account management system

initial_access.description: Directed victim to fraudulent trading platform through trusted relationship
initial_access.evidence: Victim instructed to open account on Unktlife.com

execution.description: Victim voluntarily created account and transferred cryptocurrency based on scammer instructions
execution.evidence: Victim taught how to open account and transfer crypto assets

persistence.description: Maintained control over victim's account on fake platform, showing false profits to ensure continued engagement
persistence.evidence: Platform displayed fake profits and allowed initial withdrawals

defense_evasion.description: Used legitimate-appearing trading platform interface to hide fraudulent nature
defense_evasion.evidence: Website appeared functional with account management and withdrawal features

defense_evasion.sub_technique: T1036.005 - Match Legitimate Name or Location
defense_evasion.description: Impersonated famous model to gain victim trust and credibility
defense_evasion.evidence: Scammer represented himself as famous model

defense_evasion.description: Platform shutdown to avoid detection and investigation after fund extraction
defense_evasion.evidence: Website no longer operational after scam completion

credential_access.description: Obtained victim's crypto wallet credentials or controlled platform login to prevent legitimate withdrawals
credential_access.evidence: Victim unable to withdraw funds despite account access

collection.technique: T1530 - Data from Cloud Storage Object
collection.description: Collected victim's cryptocurrency deposits into platform-controlled wallets
collection.evidence: Victim transferred crypto assets into Unktlife.com accounts

collection.description: Likely collected victim's personal and financial information during account creation

impact.description: Locked victim out of funds by demanding tax credit payment
impact.evidence: Website demanded tax credit to access funds

impact.description: Shut down platform to prevent victim recovery and investigation
impact.evidence: Website no longer operational and ceased communication

impact.description: Stole $550,000 through fake investment platform and fee extortion

phase_1_reconnaissance.description: Target identification and profiling through WeChat platform

phase_2_relationship_building.description: Establish romantic relationship using famous model persona

phase_3_investment_introduction.duration: Transition from relationship to financial involvement
objectives: Educate victim on process to establish control

phase_4_initial_engagement.description: Facilitate account creation and initial deposits
objectives: Show fake profits to build confidence

phase_5_confidence_building.description: Allow small withdrawals to establish legitimacy
objectives: Prove platform legitimacy through successful withdrawals

phase_7_extraction_trigger.description: Victim attempts large withdrawal for house purchase

phase_8_fee_extortion.description: Demand tax credit payment to access funds
objectives: Extract additional funds through fake fees
Exploit victim's desperation to recover investment
Use official-sounding terminology to appear legitimate

phase_9_exit.description: Cease communication and shut down platform

behavioral_indicators: Direction to specific unknown trading platform
Initial withdrawal success to build trust
financial_indicators: Additional payments requested after initial deposits

extraction_metadata.notes: CRITICAL HIGH-VALUE case with $550,000 loss. Sophisticated multi-phase pig butchering operation combining celebrity impersonation, romance scam, and cryptocurrency fraud. Key distinguishing features: (1) Impersonation of famous model for enhanced credibility and emotional manipulation, (2) Extended relationship building on WeChat before financial involvement, (3) Sophisticated platform with functional withdrawal capability initially, (4) Strategic use of small successful withdrawals to build false confidence, (5) Large withdrawal attempt for house purchase used as trigger for fee extortion, (6) Tax credit terminology to appear legitimate and governmental, (7) Clean exit strategy with communication cessation and platform shutdown. The case demonstrates advanced social engineering combining celebrity allure, romantic manipulation, and false legitimacy through controlled platform behavior. The $550,000 loss represents significant financial devastation and indicates victim had substantial financial resources, making them a highly targeted victim profile. Platform Unktlife.com now defunct prevents recovery and investigation. No cryptocurrency wallet addresses or transaction hashes available, limiting blockchain analysis opportunities.
